title: Life is too short
description: 23-year-old Amy is an MBA graduate who lives in Mumbai. She met Ajay at a wedding and their friendship soon turned into a strong relationship when she was merely 21 years old. Meanwhile, her brother's friend, Mark, secretly loves her. Amy and Ajay fell intensely in love with each other within a very short span of time. But there are certain pages of her life that she never wants to share with anyone. Was there a shady experience in her past that is affecting her present? Does life has a new catastrophe for her in the future as well? Will Amy be able to survive and find the happiness she desires?
author: Niveditha Praveen
